response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk\_factors": [
    ("age", "medium", "Young age (21) might make it more difficult to fully understand the consequences of actions."),
    ("race", "medium", "Identifies as Black, which may be associated with higher recidivism rates."),
    ("arrests", "high", "Four arrests indicate a history of criminal behavior."),

    ("marital_status", "medium", "Never been married and currently living alone might indicate lack of support structure."),
    ("education", "high", "Lack of high school diploma or GED certificate and no current enrollment in college can negatively impact employment opportunities and social integration."),
    ("employment", "medium", "Has held only one job during the year, which might indicate instability or difficulty adapting to work environments."),
    ("drug_use", "high", "Used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and recently felt down in the dumps, which could be indicative of mental health issues or ongoing substance abuse."),
    ("depression", "medium", "History of feeling down in the dumps might indicate a higher likelihood of recidivism due to mental health struggles."),
    ("upbringing", "medium", "Grew up with biological mother in a household of size 5 in an urban area, which could have influenced criminal behavior."),
    ("religiosity", "low", "Believes that God has something to do with what happens to him personally, but this may not directly impact recidivism.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 85
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 4 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 1 inch and weighs 165 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 5, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
